SQUAT.title: SQUAT
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Keep your back straight and chest up.
Return to the starting position by pushing through your heels.

JUMPING SQUATS.title: JUMPING SQUATS
instructions: Perform a regular squat.
As you return to the starting position, jump explosively.
Land softly and immediately go into the next squat.

HIGH KNEES.title: HIGH KNEES
instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Lift your right knee as high as possible and quickly place it back on the ground.
Immediately lift your left knee as high as possible and quickly place it back on the ground.
Continue to alternate knees as quickly as possible.

MOUNTAIN CLIMBERS.title: MOUNTAIN CLIMBERS
instructions: Start in a push-up position.
Bring your right knee towards your chest and quickly switch to bring your left knee towards your chest.
Continue to alternate knees as quickly as possible.

GLUTE BRIDGE.title: GLUTE BRIDGE
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Lift your hips off the ground until your knees, hips, and shoulders form a straight line.
Hold for a few seconds and then lower your hips back to the ground.

LUNGES.title: LUNGES
instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Take a big step forward with your right leg and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other side.

CROSSOVER LUNGE.title: CROSSOVER LUNGE
instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Take a big step forward with your right leg and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other side.

PLANK.title: PLANK
instructions: Start in a push-up position.
Bend your elbows and rest your weight on your forearms.
Your body should form a straight line from your shoulders to your ankles.
Hold this position for as long as possible.

BURPEES.title: BURPEES
instructions: Start in a standing position.
Lower your body into a squat position and place your hands on the ground.
Kick your feet back into a push-up position.
Immediately return your feet to the squat position.
Jump up from the squat position.

BICYCLE CRUNCHES.title: BICYCLE CRUNCHES
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head.
Lift your shoulders off the ground and raise your legs so your knees are close to your chest.
Straighten your right leg as you twist your upper body to the left, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Switch sides and repeat.

SIDE PLANK.title: SIDE PLANK
instructions: Lie on your side with your legs straight.
Prop your body up with your right forearm so your body forms a diagonal line.
Hold this position for as long as possible.
Repeat on the other side.

SQUAT JUMPS.title: SQUAT JUMPS
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Keep your back straight and chest up.
Return to the starting position by pushing through your heels.
As you return to the starting position, jump explosively.

WALL SIT.title: WALL SIT
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall.
Slide down the wall until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Hold this position for as long as possible.

JUMPING JACKS.title: JUMPING JACKS
instructions: Stand with your feet together and your hands at your sides.
Jump up and spread your legs while raising your arms above your head.
Jump again and return to the starting position.

TRICEP DIPS.title: TRICEP DIPS
instructions: Sit on the edge of a chair with your hands gripping the edge.
Walk your feet forward and lower your body until your arms are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Push yourself back up to the starting position.

PUSH-UPS.title: PUSH-UPS
instructions: Start in a push-up position.
Bend your elbows and lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground.
Push yourself back up to the starting position.

WALKING LUNGES.title: WALKING LUNGES
instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Take a big step forward with your right leg and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other side.

SINGLE-LEG DEADLIFTS.title: SINGLE-LEG DEADLIFTS
instructions: Stand on your left leg with your right leg slightly raised.
Lower your body by bending at your hips and extending your right leg behind you.
Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.

SINGLE-LEG GLUTE BRIDGE.title: SINGLE-LEG GLUTE BRIDGE
instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Lift your hips off the ground and extend your right leg.
Hold for a few seconds and then lower your hips back to the ground.
Repeat on the other side.

SINGLE-LEG SQUATS.title: SINGLE-LEG SQUATS
instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Lift your right leg off the ground and extend it forward.
Lower your body by bending your left knee and hips.
Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
